author: Kishan Panchal
comment: What a mesh.. too buggy.. I can't even select the line to edit it.. curser is out of control.. every time i press spacebar it just automatically types any tendon word from the current document.. and the feature of Gboard gliding on spacebar to move curser is out.. and this causes the used frustration, anger during very first page of document to be made. Why it's in the list of editors choice.. moto g5 is my device.

author: Prussian Union
comment: Nice app. Although it has ads, It's ok since the app doesn't charge and the ads aren't too numerous . Also little salty cause Word was not letting me sign in for some reason so i uninstalled and then got this app, so I may not be the most unbiased source. Regardless, works well so far.

author: Dimitry Poddubny
comment: Nice app but too buggy. Most of the time I want to save file which is on my cloud, the app telling me that there is no network connection and not saving my work and it's very frustrating. Uninstalling until devs fix it.

author: Cliff B
comment: What nonsense. I'm neither signing in nor giving you control over everything. Your competitors don't  require sign ins and they emulate Microsoft Office. Where is your Spell Check --first absolute requirement missing on slides. Delete my info, couldn't care less. Check out OfficeSuite. That should be you're primary concern.

author: Subhradeep Sarkar
comment: Having issue when saving my work in excel. It wants to create a new file with a new name. And also face data loss after reopening my old xls file. Please solve this issue.

reply.author: Infraware Inc.
reply.content:
Dear Subhro,
We are sorry for your inconvenience! If you don't mind, please check your network connection stability first, and if your problem has repeated, please forward us your original excel file and issue to support@polarisoffice.com! Thank you :)

author: Andrew Robertson
comment: The ads make this app unusable.  Sometimes closing out of an ad will minimize the entire app.  Opening the app again starts the ad over.  Essentially it gets stuck in an inescapable loop of ads.

JUST A RUBBISH TUB! It used to be a great app. It had been so. Until it released the paid ver. Tho that's acceptable, for everyone needs money. But, another thing don't  make the free ver. useless . I have no idea why the team remove some features and cram some trashy staff in. OH DEAR! Nothing to say else more. Bye.

author: Lawrence Jackson
comment: It's been about 5years now I've used this app. This is one of the most incredible tools you could have for loading, editing, and constructing documents. This is my best friend for making resumes on the fly and as long as your device isn't cheap no ad problems, the BEST!

author: pablo montagna
comment: 3 seconds after download App insist in gaining access to contacts database, my photos and archives!! I don't know if I like this. Once you give permissions, you Can't take it back. NOT HAPPY

author: Kim Harris
comment: Liking it so far but why doesn't it have the option to overwrite a file? Little annoying to have to constantly make new files when I save a document.

author: Neeewom -
comment: Been using this about a year and a half and I love it... but in the past week the totals haven't been updating when I change a value which is annoying... I have to click on the sum and press the tick for it to update... please fix and I will give 5 stars xx

author: Teiran Dragon
comment: This app is Unusable with the google keyboard, since it auto inserts random word suggestions every time you hit the space bar when typing in pre-existing text.  That's the most common keyboard app there is and this app fails right out of the gate.

author: Dominic Ross
comment: Useless.. The main feature they made it as pro-version.. Can't even edit.

author: Kshitiz Goel
comment: Frustrating app.. used to be good.. now ads make it intolerable. Don't install

author: Alex Adenuga
comment: Brilliant app. Made the redundancy of the default app that came with my note pro less annoying

author: Alexandra Connolly
comment: The ads are overwhelming... Impossible to use this when an ad takes up one third of your working space on screen. So disappointing!

author: SP Singh
comment: Too many ads , making free version useless ..when u edit file, on saving it don't save file in orignal location but asks for location from start.

author: abihail marcano
comment: Best one i ever try for my work easy to use on my phone and tabl et. Keep up the excellent job !!!!  Update 3/4/18 Still the best of the best awesomeness. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK !!!

author: Raj rajeswar mishra
comment: Not compatible for Mobile phones . It just seen to be a good app but isn't it contains bug .Plz don't use dis app

author: Lindsey Tuite
comment: After the update, it's completely useless. I can't type even a simple sentence without it automatically inserting random bits of whatever else I just typed. It just ends up gibberish.

reply.author: Infraware Inc.
reply.content: Dear lindsey, we are deeply apologize for your inconvenience. If you don't mind, could you send more detailed information about the problem to support@polarisoffice.com? Once we understand your problem more exactly, we will try our best to solve it! Thank you. -Polaris Office CS Team-

author: Mambwe Mwape
comment: Started using this app in 2013 am happy that i can still come back to it after several years and not be disappointed. It is efficient in functionality and execution. It is easy on hardware resources, thus making it a seemless joy to use on budget and older phones alike. As always though, there is room to increase the feature set. All in all, amazing app.

author: Erin StClair
comment: I couldn't even get this app to save my documents... hours worth of work lost. Downloading Microsoft excel now.
Only problem is that it requires several downloads to work right, so my phone is approaching max limit of apps.

author: Blair Smith
comment: This app insists you let allow them into your contacts. Sorry, I don't do that.

author: Farz Malik
comment: Dulu memula install elok je. Ini bila dah updated baru makin teruk pulak. Banyak fail tak boleh bukak.

author: cory small
comment: Sucks d...  Can't even type without it making up what ever nonsense it wants to. It's the worst 🤢

author: Anthony Bell
comment: Very simple interface, and a lot smoother to use than many of the document apps out there.  I give it 5 stars.

author: Siddhartha D
comment: App got crashed when I tried to upload my profile picture. Except that, rest of the things I liked it.

author: Sandeep Soni
comment: The app is very good for writing and for little bit editing but a major drawback is advertisement which pop-up again and again which disturb in working.
It literally help me in my works by saving and letting me type my important documents,file and help me in getting the notifications of my saved file.I'm loving this app.

author: Snehanshu Phukon
comment: This is a very slow reader. Has less ads than WPS Office, but still WPS is more convenient.

author: Pierre Dupras
comment: I have on my Samsung Tablet the Microsoft words..excell etc..much easier with Polaris and the program less heavy...easy to use...

author: Sony Kolen
comment: Worst up l have ever see....it is a waste of time and bundles downloading the app.One must log in with email which is not the case with Microsoft word

author: Ashley Mobey
comment: I can't get on because it won't let me set a password even though all the passwords I have tried to use match the requirements

author: Michael Bass
comment: So far it is a great way to edit office documents. Easy to use.

author: Michael Russell
comment: Its alright for see documents i not know if it reads encrypted ones though? Works good on simple files though.

author: Kamand M
comment: Helpful "It helps me a lot. Thank you so much."

author: Bruce Young
comment: I find this app very easy to use, good features

author: Robert Bolduc
comment: Works asintended. I use it for modifying my excel inventory list at work.

author: Kathy Edwards
comment: It gives me the information sent to me by my employers.  I don't need to guess, very specific.
